long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The main purpose of this tool is to assist the front-end in style comparison during development. By directly displaying Figma layers on the Browser, the design draft and development effects can be visually compared, allowing for quick identification of implementation inconsistencies with the design draft;
In addition, it supports both Chinese and English, as well as day and night modes
